top_projects.name: Resurrected-Dump1090
top_projects.description: "Dump1090" offers a thrilling journey into the fascinating realm of SDR. This project aims to provide beginners with an accessible and fun platform to explore SDR concepts and experiment with radio signals.

top_projects.name: ProjectZero
top_projects.description: A simple Vulnerable Web-App for Classroom Training.

top_projects.name: py_mailer
top_projects.description: A simple Python Script for send emails.

top_projects.name: flippertools
top_projects.description: random things that just worked with flipper

top_projects.name: Amass-Log-to-CSV
top_projects.description: This Python script is designed to transform the output from your Amass scan into a more manageable CSV file format. This conversion allows for easier data manipulation and analysis.

top_projects.name: phishme
top_projects.description: I created this for my classroom training. A lazy way to start a phishing server with the help of ngrok (I hate port forwarding).

anir0y/anir0y.github.io.summary: Recent activities in this repository include multiple push events from December 3 to December 18, 2024, with updates to deploy.yml, addition of Clarity, creation and updates to 404.html, and various code fixes and improvements, demonstrating ongoing development and maintenance of the repository.

anir0y/justiceshasbeendenied.com.summary: This repository had a push event on December 10, 2024, with a single commit message 'push1', indicating minimal recent activity.

profile_summary: I'm Animesh Roy, a seasoned infosec professional with 10+ years of experience, skilled in C, TypeScript, and Go, and passionate about breaking security for a living. With a strong network of 54 followers and 159 public repositories, I'm committed to staying up-to-date with the latest threats and trends, as seen in my work at @autohackos and shared on my personal website, https://anir0y.in. I leverage my technical expertise to stay ahead of emerging threats, as highlighted in my shared news updates on recent breaches and cybersecurity incidents.
